response.body:
Chatbot
Today
Deploy with Vercel
Hello there!
How can I help you today?

item.description:
Using Auth.js in this feature implementation.

If you need to login to this system. Please follow the following steps:

1. GET [http://localhost:4000/api/auth/csrf](http://localhost:4000/api/auth/csrfEndFragment) for the csrf token and cookies.
    
2. POST [http://localhost:4000/api/auth/callback/credentials?json=true](http://localhost:4000/api/auth/callback/credentials?json=true) for login in, with three necessary attributions.
    
    1. email
        
    2. password
        
    3. csrfToken
